text:
If this record occurs in the worksheet Substream, it indicates that the 
formulas have not been recalculated before the document was saved. 
Modifications are :
- Add record
- modification of Sheet to add setUncalced() and getUncalced() method + 
modification of generation
- Propagation in usermodel
creator: leprinco@yahoo.fr
leprinco@yahoo.fr

New class UncalcedRecord and new XLS file for testing

creator: yegor@dinom.ru
text:
The test XLS is missing. Please attach it.

Regards,
Yegor

This patch looks great, thanks for that

As Yegor said, the xls file used in your test didn't make it into the zip, and a
svn patch never includes binary objects.

Please could you upload the xls file, then we can apply the patch?
